content: I show you my stuff with DM Scotty hey guys in today's episode of I show you my
stuff I've been doing my lay of my face spider lair and the players didn't plan
through it if you watch those play bids so I'd like to show something that I use
from the lair I actually made I use a face spider but I had I did a custom job
on it I also wanted to faze webs to look interesting and different from the
regular webs so let's go to the table and I'll show you how I did that
hey guys this is my giant face spider and this is a huge fiendish spider from
the D&D figure line and what I did is I modified you can see I covered up the
head I put a female head on the front and I blended it in with some of that
epoxy that I've talked about before the two-part epoxy I also added a little bit
of paint job to I add some purple coloring to the spider itself and then I
fixed the base I didn't I don't like those giant black faces so I changed the
base up now one cool thing I had with in the encounter if you watch the encounter
was I had I want to have faze webs and I want to have them different from the
normal webs that I've done so let me pop a few of these down and show you what so
here's the phase webs I made and I think they look really great I think they look
like like they would be phase web so let me give you a closer look at one and as
you can see it has the same type of pattern I've done on the spider web so
if you wanted to have the spider web of video I did so if you want know how to
despite I've watched that video so that I just did the same type of pattern
except I just did it on a different material I use that material that I used
for the gate this is that it's like a folder cover and I just cut it up it's
like a vinyl folder become translucent vinyl folder cover and I just cut it up
and then use the webbing technique on it now I also you notice there's a little
bit of color out so I did a little wash with some of
tallip purple and that gave it just a touch of color that made it look kind of
cool and shimmery and stuff so there you go there's some phase web easy super
easy phase webs for your game if you're interested so I'll see you next time I
wanna show you my stuff hey crafters I hope you've enjoyed this
episode of the DMS craft make sure to subscribe and I have tons of other
videos as you can see I am the originator of the 2.5 D method of
crafting tiles I also do dirt cheap terrain for the table if all this
intrigues you make sure you check out all the videos below also join my forum
we have lots of great crafters on there who give advice I have a link above and
below and last but not least remember go forth and craft
you
